hero.description: I'm the founder of Frenify. A professional UI/UX designer and web developer based in London. Occasionally working as a freelancer.

biography.title: BIOGRAPHY
biography.description: I’m a freelance front-end developer with over 12 years of experience. Based in London, UK. I code and create web elements for amazing people around the world. I love working with new people — every new person means a new experience.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Engineer
experience.description: Developing interactive web interfaces using modern UI technologies, creating design systems, and ensuring performance optimization.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
experience.description: Worked in the Google Ads team to build reusable components and user-friendly interfaces.

experience.title: Graphic Designer
experience.description: Created visual designs, brand identity, and UI concepts for social media campaigns.

education.title: Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in web technologies, software engineering, and modern frameworks.

education.title: Master’s Degree
education.description: Thesis focused on user experience design and front-end development.

education.title: Bachelor’s Degree
education.description: Fundamentals of computer engineering and software development.

items.skill: HTML5 / CSS3 / Tailwind CSS / Shadcn UI / Material UI

skills.summary: A freelance creative designer with a passion for minimal design, clean typography, and well-written code. Providing high-quality and cost-effective web and software development services.

resume.summary: A freelance creative designer with a love for minimal design.

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.description: Currently, I’m working on a professional, visually sophisticated, technologically proficient, responsive, and multi-functional web theme. If you’re interested in working with me, click the button below and let’s talk about your project.
portfolio.button: If You’re Interested, Get in Touch With Me

services.title: SERVICES
services.description: I help ambitious businesses like yours generate more profit by building awareness, driving web traffic, connecting with customers, and growing overall sales. My only rule — I never work through agencies; I prefer direct communication with clients.

cards.title: Web & Product Design
cards.description: From low-fidelity wireframes and prototypes to final coded designs. We don’t just deliver static visuals; we love working directly in the browser (♥ CSS) and tools like Figma. Using modern frameworks, we collaborate with developers to deliver complete digital experiences.

cards.title: Brand Identity
cards.description: From a single logo to a complete branding system. We believe in refining and updating existing logos to enhance effectiveness without losing brand equity. Each identity project is crafted to reflect your unique story.

cards.title: Iconography
cards.description: We create custom icon sets that match your product’s personality and tone. Icons are hand-crafted for pixel perfection and optimized for web and mobile applications.

cards.title: UI/UX Consulting
cards.description: We audit your existing website or product and provide actionable recommendations for usability, accessibility, and conversion optimization. Ideal for startups looking to improve user experience.

cards.title: Landing Page Development
cards.description: High-converting, SEO-friendly landing pages built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Optimized for performance, analytics, and responsive design.

cards.title: E-commerce Design
cards.description: We design and develop Shopify or WooCommerce stores that are visually appealing, fast, and optimized for sales. Includes custom themes and checkout experiences.

blog.title: NEWS & TIPS
blog.description: Stay up to date with insights about design, creativity, and technology. Explore stories and ideas that inspire modern web experiences.

posts.title: What You Know About Design & What You Don’t.
Top 10 UI/UX Trends That Will Shape Web Design in 2025.
How Minimalism Shapes Modern Brand Identities.
Why Developers Should Understand Design Principles.
Building a Portfolio That Stands Out in 2025.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: I help ambitious businesses like yours generate more profits by building awareness, driving traffic, connecting with customers, and increasing overall sales. My only rule — I don’t work through agencies; I prefer direct communication with clients.
